name: Watch out Zombies!
description:
Get as far as possible across the roads, subways, grass and crazy zombie drivers. But that’s not all, there are also zombies that want to catch you. Watch out Zombies! Play as boy or girl and make the cars run over zombies or make them fall to the subway tunnel.

Features:

* Play as boy or girl
* Smash over 7 different zombies
* Complete over 25 challenges
* Unlock over 20 achievements
* Beat your friends high score in the online leaderboards!
* Hours and days of exciting gameplay and easy style of control
